com.dermalog.hardware.cardreader

Interface CardReaderManager


  • public interface CardReaderManager
    Manager for getting a list of available CardReaders and getting a CardReader instance

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  CardReaderManager.OnPermissionRequestCompleted
      Callback for requestPermission()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CardReader getCardReader(String slot)
      Instantiates and returns a CardReader
      List<String> getSupportedSlots() 
      boolean hasPermissions(String slot)
      Check whether the app has the required permissions to use the CardReader slot.
      boolean requestPermissions(String slot, CardReaderManager.OnPermissionRequestCompleted callback)
      Ask user for permission to use the CardReader slot

    • Method Detail

      • getCardReader

        CardReader getCardReader(String slot)
                  throws CardReaderException
        Instantiates and returns a CardReader
        Parameters:
        slot - which CardReader interface to open (one of the returned values from getSupportedSlots()
        Returns:
        CardReader instance
        Throws:
        CardReaderException

      • getSupportedSlots

        List<String> getSupportedSlots()
        Returns:
        a List of Strings representing available CardReader interfaces on current device

      • hasPermissions

        boolean hasPermissions(String slot)
        Check whether the app has the required permissions to use the CardReader slot. If not, use requestPermission to get them
        Parameters:
        slot - which CardReader slot to check
        Returns:
        true if app has permissions

      • requestPermissions

        boolean requestPermissions(String slot,
                           CardReaderManager.OnPermissionRequestCompleted callback)
        Ask user for permission to use the CardReader slot
        Parameters:
        slot - which slot to ask for permissions for
        callback - will be called after decision about permission was made by user/android
        Returns:
        true if permission will be request, false if request is not necessary
